title: I NEED HELP
body: Someone figured out my username and password and changed my email so I cant change it back. Theyre changing things inside my game, and I am putting in tickets and getting responses. However, I cannot click on the word submit when I go to reply. I NEED to talk to a human. I am extremely desperate because as long as I am talking to the bot, I cant respond. I dont know why I cant click on the word submit, I have done it on my phone and computer, and submitted many tickets. I love this account and just got to gold, and Im horrified of losing it. Please someone help!

replies.body: Ticket volume might be a bit higher right now, so it may be a bit.  If you keep replying or spamming new tickets, though, it can cause confusion and delays in investigating your case.  If you have a ticket number I'm down to check it for you, but your best bet is to hang tight while we review what's happening.  Rest easy, though, we can help with recovery!
Ok, now my account has been permanently suspended. Please help!!!!

It looks like your specialist locked your account for protective measures against the unauthorized party, per the ticket.  Get back to your specialist when you get a chance, and he'll continue helping out with recovery.  Good luck!
